name: Homemade Chicken Nuggets 🍗
description: High protein homemade chicken nuggets - 372 calories, 51g protein
steps: Add all ingredients to food processor
Blend until smooth mixture forms
Shape into nugget shapes
Place on baking tray
Bake at 200°C (390°F) for 18-20 minutes
Serve hot and enjoy!

name: 1 Calorie Meringue Cookies
description: Yes you saw that right - 1 calorie meringue cookies! So easy to make with just a few ingredients and perfect for snacking!
ingredients: ¼ tsp cream of tartar (optional, helps stabilise)
½ tsp vanilla extract (or almond extract)
Sugar substitute for baking equal to 200g sugar sweetness (e.g., erythritol, xylitol, allulose, or blend like Sukrin Gold)
steps: [Steps not fully visible in screenshot - see video for complete instructions]
notes: Complete ingredients from comments. Steps: Whip egg whites with cream of tartar until stiff peaks, gradually add sweetener and vanilla, pipe onto baking sheet, bake low and slow until crisp.

name: ❄️ Protein Cinnamon Buns ❄️
steps: Mix yogurt, flour and baking powder in a bowl and knead with your hands
Form into a ball then roll out into a thin rectangle
Spray light layer of cooking spray, followed by cinnamon/zero cal sweetener
Roll it up and slice into 4 equal size pieces
Place in baking dish and bake at 350°F for 20-30 min until puffy and golden
While baking, make icing by combining yogurt, protein powder, and cream cheese in a bowl
Whisk icing until smooth
Pour icing over warm cinnamon buns
Enjoy!

name: 53g Protein Crustless Pizza Pie
ingredients: 4 oz (115g) turkey pepperoni or chicken breast pieces
Optional toppings: mushrooms, bell peppers, olives, onions, jalapeños, fresh basil
Optional: pinch of red pepper flakes
steps: Preheat oven to 400°F (205°C)
Prep a 9-inch pie dish with non-stick spray or oil
Whisk eggs in a bowl, then add cottage cheese, mozzarella, Parmesan, Italian seasoning, garlic powder, and pepper. Stir until combined.
Pour mixture into prepared dish and bake for 18-22 minutes until set and edges are golden
Remove from oven and spread pizza sauce on top
Add pepperoni/chicken and any extra toppings, plus extra mozzarella if desired
Bake again for 8-12 minutes until cheese melts and top looks pizza-like
Optional: Broil for 1-2 minutes for browning (watch carefully)
Let cool for 10 minutes to firm up, then slice and serve
